amendment.description: Amendment deletes language which allowed the Secretary of State to waive certain provisions that limit assistance to foreign countries which refuse to expedite to the U.S. any individual accused in the United States of killing a law enforcement officer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to remove the waiver authority with respect to the funding limitation of Section 581.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
